imac.level

Class Level

  • java.lang.Object
    • imac.level.Level

  • public class Level
extends java.lang.Object
    Level class allow to load a level game from a JSON file.

    It generates a Space and a Rocket player, @see Space, @see Rocket

    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Pierre

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Level(processing.core.PApplet p, int level)
      The constructor of Level It loads configuration files (player and level) to initialize the player and the space level
